Luzbel:

The male jumped Backwards, he had to admit that Aerotaur was a 
skillfull warrior an that made him feel upset. He quickly tranform in 
beast mode (A dragon) and he spat fire to Aerotaur.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     He brought up his staff to parry the slashes.  With his other 
hand he 
> pulled the spined tail out of his legs.  His legs hurt but he could 
still 
> walk.  He continued parrying the energon blade with his staff.  He 
brought up 
> the tail and swung it at Luzbel.
